SEARCH
Package org.jfree.chart.plot

Class CompassPlot

java.lang.Object
org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock
org.jfree.chart.plot.Plot
org.jfree.chart.plot.CompassPlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Block, ContentBlock, AxisChangeListener, LegendItemSource, DatasetChangeListener, org.jfree.ui.Drawable, org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable
public class CompassPlot extends Plot implements Block, Cloneable, Serializable
A specialised plot that draws a compass to indicate a direction based on the value from a ValueDataset.
Author:
Bryan Scott
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

      public void setSeriesNeedle(int type)

    • setSeriesNeedle

      public void setSeriesNeedle(int index, int type)
      Sets the needle for a series. The needle type is one of the following:
      • 0 = ArrowNeedle;
      • 1 = LineNeedle;
      • 2 = LongNeedle;
      • 3 = PinNeedle;
      • 4 = PlumNeedle;
      • 5 = PointerNeedle;
      • 6 = ShipNeedle;
      • 7 = WindNeedle;
      • 8 = ArrowNeedle;
      • 9 = MiddlePinNeedle;
      Parameters:
      index - the series index.
      type - the needle type.

    • setSeriesNeedle

      public void setSeriesNeedle(int index, MeterNeedle needle)
      Sets the needle for a series.
      Parameters:
      index - the series index.
      needle - the needle.

    • getDatasets

      public ValueDataset[] getDatasets()
      Returns the dataset.

      Provided for convenience.

      Returns:
      The dataset for the plot, cast as a ValueDataset.

      plotArea - the area within which the plot should be drawn.

      parentState - the state from the parent plot, if there is one.
